MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 postcode area of Abergele, affecting properties in Llanfairtalhaiaran and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:52pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20pm on 8th November 2020
